## ElevationProvider interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ElevationProvider 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clearCache()](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.clearcache.md) | Clears the internal cache. |
|  [getDisplacementMap(tileKey)](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.getdisplacementmap.md) | Get the displacement map for a given tile key. If the displacement map for the given tileKey is not in the cache a lower level tile will be returned. |
|  [getHeight(geoPoint, level)](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.getheight.md) | Get elevation for a given geo point. |
|  [getTilingScheme()](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.gettilingscheme.md) |  |
|  [rayCast(x, y)](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.raycast.md) | Cast a ray through the given screen position x, y. |
|  [sampleHeight(geoPoint, tileDisplacementMap)](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.sampleheight.md) | Samples elevation for a given geo point from the specified displacement map. |
